subject: Meena Bazar
details: The price was listed as 150 but they charged 165 at the counter. Authority was notified.

subject: Karwan Bazar Wholesaler
details: The wholesaler is forcing us to buy at a very high rate, not providing proper receipts.

subject: Rahim Store
details: Selling rice packets above the MRP.

subject: Unnamed Middleman
details: A middleman is blocking direct access to the market. Matter resolved with local admin.

subject: Ali's Shop
details: Refused to sell potatoes unless we bought 5kg. Price is too high.

subject: Daily Bazaar
details: Price of local onion is almost the same as imported. Seems like price fixing.

subject: Transport Syndicate
details: Trucks carrying mangoes from Rajshahi were stopped and forced to pay extra toll, increasing our costs.

subject: Salam Traders
details: This wholesaler is hoarding onions and not selling to small shops.

subject: Sylhet Town Market Stall
details: Mobile court fined the seller for price gouging.

subject: Sherpur Market Committee
details: They are not letting us sell rice at the government-fixed price.

subject: Patuakhali Cold Storage
details: They are creating an artificial shortage by not releasing watermelons from storage.

subject: Bogura Market
details: Potatoes are being sold at a very high price.

subject: Ferry Ghat extortion
details: Extortion at the ferry terminal is adding cost to every truck of onions coming from the west.

subject: Local Market Stall
details: User complaint was found to be a personal dispute, not a market issue.

subject: Noakhali Distributor
details: Distributor is not supplying enough stock to keep prices stable.

subject: Bhairab Syndicate
details: A local syndicate is forcing us to sell all our onions to them at a fixed low rate.

subject: Bogura Cold Storage
details: Investigation completed, storage owner warned.

subject: Super Shop
details: Product was a premium import, price was justified.

subject: CTG Port Agent
details: Delay in releasing imported oil from the port is causing market instability.

subject: Fruit Vendor
details: Extremely high price for end-of-season mangoes.

subject: Pesticide Seller
details: Selling low-quality pesticides which damaged the crop, leading to lower supply.

subject: Online Grocery Page
details: Charged 60 Taka/kg for potatoes online, which is much higher than any physical market.

subject: Sirajganj Bridge Toll
details: Excessive and unofficial tolls being charged for all goods trucks.

subject: Narayanganj Market
details: Market committee intervened and stabilized the price.

subject: Brahmanbaria Bazar
details: Mixing old rice with new and selling at a high price.

subject: Local Money Lender
details: Forcing us to sell our produce to him to repay loans at a rate far below market value.

subject: Madaripur Arath
details: The quality of onion supplied is very poor but price is high.

subject: Khulna New Market
details: Seller is not using proper weight scales.

subject: Naogaon Rice Mill
details: Rice mill is delaying payment for our paddy.

subject: Patuakhali Fish Market
details: This is not even a primary vegetable shop but they are selling onions at an insane price.

subject: Agarwal Sweets
details: Complaint about price of a single Shingara, not raw potato. Invalid.

subject: Gabtoli Entry Point
details: Illegal 'line money' being charged for trucks to enter the city.

subject: Local Shop
details: Selling soybean oil without a price tag on the bottle.

subject: Pabna Onion Syndicate
details: Syndicate leaders are forcing all farmers in the area to sell to them only.

subject: Online Food Delivery
details: Price is for a special imported onion variety, which was stated on the website.

subject: Comilla Wholesaler
details: Receiving underweight sacks of potatoes from the main distributor.

subject: Barishal Bazar
details: Shopkeeper is selling lower grade rice in premium grade packaging.

subject: Rangpur Cold Storage Union
details: The cold storage association has collectively decided not to release potatoes to create a price hike.

subject: Khatunganj Trader
details: Trader was fined for not displaying the price chart.

subject: Local Market
details: Selling chemically ripened mangoes that are harmful.
